title: Release 9.0.0 broken
body:
#### Problem Description
When pulling the latest docker image with version 9.0.0 it's not possible anymore to see the requests, and requests are not successfull  anymore.

#### Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. update to latest docker image with version 9.0.0

#### System Information
docker with image  9.0.0

Debug log:

```
[13:26:05.031] HTTP(S) proxy listening at *:8080.
[13:26:05.031] Web server listening at http://0.0.0.0:8081/
[13:26:05.206] Addon error: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/mitmproxy/addons/tlsconfig.py", line 301, in running
    self.configure("confdir")  # pragma: no cover
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/mitmproxy/addons/tlsconfig.py", line 308, in configure
    self.certstore = certs.CertStore.from_store(
                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/mitmproxy/certs.py", line 358, in from_store
    cls.create_store(path, basename, key_size)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/mitmproxy/certs.py", line 407, in create_store
    (path / f"{basename}-ca.pem").write_bytes(
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/pathlib.py", line 1067, in write_bytes
    with self.open(mode='wb') as f:
         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/pathlib.py", line 1044, in open
    return io.open(self, mode, buffering, encoding, errors, newline)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/home/mitmproxy/.mitmproxy/mitmproxy-ca.pem'
[13:26:05.208] No web browser found. Please open a browser and point it to http://0.0.0.0:8081/
[13:26:17.523][172.20.0.11:34088] client connect
[13:26:17.553][172.20.0.11:34088] server connect hidden.nl:443 (87.233.92.107:443)
[13:26:17.641] Addon error: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/mitmproxy/addons/tlsconfig.py", line 152, in tls_start_client
    entry = self.get_cert(tls_start.context)
            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/mitmproxy/addons/tlsconfig.py", line 380, in get_cert
    return self.certstore.get_cert(altnames[0], altnames, organization)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get_cert'
[13:26:17.641][172.20.0.11:34088] No TLS context was provided, failing connection.
[13:26:17.643][172.20.0.11:34088] client disconnect
[13:26:17.644][172.20.0.11:34088] server disconnect hidden.nl:443 (87.233.92.107:443)
```
